channel.title: Need a perfect anti lagg what will work ;)

item.title: Need a perfect anti lagg what will work ;)
item.dc:creator: @anuslikker anuslikker
item.description:
@anuslikker wrote:

I need a perfect anti lagg what will work because what i got now is this:

[code]// This resets server every 30 mins to stop lag - xerozcheez
import java.io.*;

public class antilag
{

public int ResetTimer = 0;

public void resetserver()
{
misc.println(“RESETING SERVER!!!”);
misc.println(“Saving all games…”);
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“GAME SUCCESSFULLY SAVED FOR ALL PLAYERS”);
ResetTimer = 0;
closeListener();
runserver();
}
public void process()
{
ResetTimer += 1;
if(ResetTimer >= 1800)
{
resetserver();
}
}

public void runserver()
{
try
{
String run = “runserver.bat”;
String xstr = “./”+run;
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(xstr);
}
catch (IOException ioe)
{
ioe.printStackTrace();
}
}

public void closeListener()
{
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if(server.clientListener != null) server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
}
catch(java.lang.Exception __ex)
{
__ex.printStackTrace();
}
}
}[/code]

i know the timer is good but if he will restart than the compiler will tell port already inuse :S he reconnect but i can click all my runeserver/compiler away and the server will run 2 :S dunno if he runs to if my computer is off i dont think so or if i get my internet down :S.

someone kow what is wrong or send me a good one

Read full topic
item.source: Need a perfect anti lagg what will work ;)
